name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro
description: The iPhone 14 Pro features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A16 Bionic chip, and a 48MP camera system for stunning photos and videos.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra comes with a powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, 200MP camera, and S-Pen for productivity and creativity.

name: Google Pixel 7 Pro
description: The Google Pixel 7 Pro delivers exceptional AI-powered photography, Google Tensor G2 chip, and a stunning 6.7-inch LTPO OLED display.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
description: Sony WH-1000XM5 noise-canceling headphones offer superior sound quality, 30-hour battery life, and industry-leading ANC technology.

name: Bose QuietComfort 45
description: Bose QC45 headphones provide comfortable listening with powerful noise cancellation, crisp audio, and up to 24-hour battery life.

name: MacBook Pro M2
description: Apple MacBook Pro with M2 chip delivers incredible speed, a Liquid Retina XDR display, and up to 20 hours of battery life for professionals.

name: Dell XPS 13 Plus
description: The Dell XPS 13 Plus features an edge-to-edge display, 12th Gen Intel Core processor, and a sleek, minimalist design for top-tier productivity.

name: Asus ROG Strix G15
description: Asus ROG Strix G15 gaming laptop comes with AMD Ryzen 9, RTX 3070 GPU, and a 300Hz display for smooth gaming performance.

name: Nike Air Max 270
description: Nike Air Max 270 offers all-day comfort with a large Air unit, breathable mesh, and a stylish, modern design.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 22
description: Adidas Ultraboost 22 running shoes provide responsive cushioning, energy return, and a Primeknit upper for a snug fit.
